    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableSeatCount

        int getAvailableSeatCount(int venueLevel)
        Parameters:
        venueLevel - a numeric venue level identifier to limit the search
        Returns:
        the number of tickets available on the provided level

      • confirmBooking

        String confirmBooking(long seatHoldId,
                      String CustomerEmailId)
        Parameters:
        seatHoldId - a numeric booking id obtain as a result of seat hold
        CustomerEmailId - representing customers email id used for seat hold
        Returns:
        a confirmation a string to be returned in case of successful reservation

      • checkAndHold

        SeatHold checkAndHold(int numSeats,
                      String customerEmail,
                      String ConfirmationCode)
        Parameters:
        numSeats - a numeric value representing no of seats to be hold
        customerEmail - represent the customer's email id for which seats are being hold
        ConfirmationCode - a string to be returned in case of successful reservation
        Returns:
        SeatHold which contains all the details about seat hold

      • getAvailableLevels

        List<Integer> getAvailableLevels()
        Returns:
        a collection containing all the setting level available within the Venue.

      • getAvailableSeatCount

        int getAvailableSeatCount()
        Returns:
        a numeric value representing count of available seats in the Venue.

      • holdSeat

        long holdSeat(String emailId,
              String ConfirmationCD)
        Parameters:
        emailId - representing customers email id used for seat hold
        ConfirmationCD - a string to be returned in case of successful reservation
        Returns:
        a positive numeric value representing a valid seat hold id generated after seat hold

      • holdSeatBook

        void holdSeatBook(long seat_hold_id,
                  int level_id,
                  int seatCount)
        Parameters:
        seat_hold_id - a positive numeric value representing a valid seat hold id generated after seat hold
        level_id - represents the venue level on which hold is requested
        seatCount - is the seat count requested in the seat hold operation.

      • deleteExpiredHold

        void deleteExpiredHold()
        It is most important function called every time to invalidate or remove all the expired seat hold details from the database based on the timestamp.

      • checkAndHold

        SeatHold checkAndHold(int numSeats,
                      int minLevel,
                      int maxLevel,
                      String customerEmail,
                      String confirmationCode)
        Parameters:
        numSeats - is the seat count requested in the seat hold operation.
        minLevel - is the minimum level on which seat hold is requested.
        maxLevel - is the maximum level on which seat hold is requested.
        customerEmail - representing customers email id used for seat hold
        confirmationCode - a string to be returned in case of successful reservation
        Returns:
        SeatHold which contains all the details about seat hold

      • checkValidHold

        boolean checkValidHold(long seatHoldId,
                       String emailId)
        Parameters:
        seatHoldId - a positive numeric value representing a valid seat hold id generated after seat hold
        emailId - customerEmail representing customers email id used for seat hold
        Returns:
        boolean confirming whether a valid seat hold id and email Id used for booking

      • getAvailableSeatCount

        int getAvailableSeatCount(int minLevel,
                          int maxLevel)
        Parameters:
        minLevel - is the minimum level on which seat hold is requested.
        maxLevel - is the maximum level on which seat hold is requested.
        Returns:
        a numeric value representing count of available seats in the all the levels between min and max levels .

      • revokeReservation

        void revokeReservation()
        It is used to remove to all the reservations from the database to re-initialize it.
